instructions: Make sure you've downloaded the Gmail app . On your iPhone or iPad, open the Gmail app . Open the message. (If you want to stay in your inbox, tap the sender's profile image). In the top right, tap Unread .

Make sure you've downloaded the Gmail app . On your iPhone or iPad, open the Gmail app . On the left, tap the sender's profile image next to the messages you want to mark. In the top right, tap Read .
